StateControl.1.suspend.description: With this method the service can be suspended. Suspending when already in suspended mode has no effect.

StateControl.1.resume.description: With this method the service can be resumed from suspended mode. Resuming from a not suspended mode has no effect.

statechange.summary: Signals a state change of the service.

suspended.description: Determines if the service has entered suspended state (true) or resumed state (false)
